about_me.title: About Me
about_me.intro: My name is Lukas Bühler, I'm {{my_age}} years old and from Switzerland.
about_me.text1:
I'm a student at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Zurich, where I'm studying Computational Science and Engineering.
I am also working on my own projects, most of which are software related. Check them out here: development section.
Besides being a student and a developer I am also a ski coach for the Ski Club Beverin in Graubünden.
about_me.phrase: Skiing has always been a big passion for me.
about_me.text2: I have been skiing since I was little. And as soon as I could I joined the Skiclub Beverin and started participating in ski races. I am still active in the ski club today and now happily doing my part as a coach there.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Feel free to reach out via e-mail.
